title: “Business as usual,” say analysts ahead of Brazil’s next monetary policy meeting
description:
The Monetary Policy Committee of Brazil’s Central Bank meets next Tuesday and Wednesday, and the overwhelming view among analysts and investment banks is that they will continue recent trends and cut the country’s benchmark interest rate by half a percentage point. According to a survey carried out by investment bank BTG Pactual, 95 percent of […]
